name: Anticipation
summary: The user will "shudder" if the opponent switches in and has a super-effective move or an OHKO-move.
viability:
This is a decent ability for scouting. If you're running a Ferrothorn or Wormadam-Trash, having the ability to find out if a Pokémon has that Fire-type move will be nice.
	
	Unfortunately, almost all the Pokémon that have access to Anticipation have access to a much better ability. Ferrothorn has Iron Barbs, Wormadam has Overcoat, Toxicroak has Dry Skin, and Whiscash has Oblivious.
